âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ Extracts RSS/Atom feeds from the active tab. â€¢ Opens feeds with an RSS reader app or custom web service. â€¢ Supports unofficial feeds for some popular websites (e.g., YouTube). â€¢ Indicates whether a website offers RSS/Atom feeds. â€¢ Basic integration with 3rd-party readers via buildable URLs.
ðŸ“– Summary: The RSS Launchpad extension simplifies RSS subscription management by extracting available feeds from websites. It allows users to easily subscribe to these feeds using their preferred RSS reader application or web service. The extension also supports unofficial feeds for certain websites, enhancing its versatility.
